name: Zombie Apocalypse - The Last Defense
description:
Create your own strategies to survive for 25 days and stop the zombies from passing through the gate, preventing the infection from spreading across the world.

Strengthen your weapons with a wide variety of power-ups



Position your soldiers strategically


Press Q to Zoom




  • Manage your resources wisely.
  • Use your creativity to create unique strategies.
  • Place explosive mines to stop the zombies.
  • Buy allies to help you in this frantic war.
  • Enjoy the epic soundtrack.
  • 15 power-ups.
  • Great variety of upgrades.
  • 10 towers.
  • A wide range of enemies.
  • Survive for 25 days.
  • Beautiful visual effects.
  • Climate variation.
  • Enemies get stronger at night.
  • Drive car and war tank.
  • Much more!
Develop now your perfectly strategy to survive!
